summary: Implements the DCE/RPC Management protocol utilities, offering an exception type for session errors and a set of helper routines that query interface identifiers, retrieve the server principal name, obtain server statistics, check whether the server is listening, and request the server to stop listening.
business_intent: Allows security tools and administrators to programmatically monitor and control DCE/RPC services on remote systems, facilitating enumeration of available RPC interfaces, collection of operational metrics, and management of the server's listening state.
